name: BfROpenLab
body:
## What is BfROpenLab?
BfROpenLab is a collection of several extensions for the data analytics software KNIME (http://www.knime.org/). It is developed at the Federal Institute for Risk Assessment in Germany (BfR) and contains the following extensions:

* FoodChain-Lab
* KNIME Nodes for GIS and Graph Visualization
* KNIME Nodes for Nonlinear Regression

## How to install it?
Download KNIME from http://www.knime.org/ and install it. All BfROpenLab extensions can be installed from the following update site: http://dl.bintray.com/silebat/generic/

[Detailed Installation Guide for FoodChain-Lab](https://github.com/SiLeBAT/BfROpenLabResources/raw/master/GitHubPages/documents/foodchainlab_installation/installation.pdf)

## FoodChain-Lab
FoodChain-Lab is an KNIME extension providing trace back and forward analysis of suspicious food items along food supply chains in case of a foodborne disease outbreak. Currently the supply chain data can be imported from an Excel template. Be aware that this template is still a prototype. In the future a different import procedure may be used. To get a first impression of what you can do with FoodChain-Lab please watch the video demonstration below.

[Video Demonstration](https://github.com/SiLeBAT/BfROpenLabResources/raw/master/GitHubPages/videos/foodchain_lab_demo.mp4)

In 2013 and 2014 FoodChain-Lab was used in a multinational hepatitis A virus outbreak in Europe.

[EFSA report of hepatitis A outbreak](http://www.efsa.europa.eu/en/efsajournal/doc/3821.pdf)

[Recent Presentation of FoodChain-Lab](https://github.com/SiLeBAT/BfROpenLabResources/raw/master/GitHubPages/documents/08_FoodChainLab_Weiser.pdf)

### Tutorials

[FoodChain-Lab Overview](https://github.com/SiLeBAT/BfROpenLabResources/raw/master/GitHubPages/documents/foodchainlab_overview/overview.pdf)

[How to import workflows into FoodChain-Lab?](https://github.com/SiLeBAT/BfROpenLabResources/raw/master/GitHubPages/documents/foodchainlab_import/import.pdf)

### Example workflows/data

[Excel template with fictional data](https://github.com/SiLeBAT/BfROpenLabResources/raw/master/GitHubPages/documents/fake_data.xls)

[Example workflow based on fictional data](https://github.com/SiLeBAT/BfROpenLabResources/raw/master/GitHubPages/workflows/Example_Workflow.zip)

[Geocoding Workflow](https://github.com/SiLeBAT/BfROpenLabResources/raw/master/GitHubPages/workflows/Geocoding.zip)

[Workflow for finding missing data/deliveries](https://github.com/SiLeBAT/BfROpenLabResources/raw/master/GitHubPages/workflows/MissingDeliveries.zip)
